mapper.insert: insert into t_tran( id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime ) values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{money}, #{name}, #{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime} )
mapper.select:
select t.id, u.name as owner, t.name, cu.name as customerId, t.stage, t.type, t.source, co.fullname as contactsId from t_tran t join t_customer cu on t.customerId=cu.id join t_user u on t.owner=u.id join t_contacts co on t.contactsId=co.id
t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and co.fullname like '%' #{contactsName} '%'
and cu.name like '%' #{customerName} '%'
order by t.createTime desc limit #{skipCount},#{pageSize}
